job_title: Front Desk Receptionist in Lansdale, PA
pros: The culture is a breath of fresh air.  Every staff member is kind and caring to each other as well as to residents.  The leadership at all levels is supportive and empathetic to their employees and treat them with respect at all times.  I love how every department interacts with one another and that the staff has the ability to float from one department to another in order to help out when needed;  providing  welcomed development opportunities.  The company strongly encourages and supports personal and professional growth.
cons: The only con I have at this time is that I am not a full time employee yet.  (Not the fault of Living Branches!)

cons: Pay checks are seem to be sketchy, overtime is almost impossible if you work past your shift, management look down at you, some play dumb and pretend they don’t know there’s things happening on floor when they know fully well and are too lazy to do anything about it.
